newsitem.title: USA: May Department Sept same-store sales up.
newsitem.headline: May Department Sept same-store sales up.

text.p: May Department Stores Inc said Thursday its same-store sales rose 0.4 percent in September.
May's total sales rose to $1.07 billion in September from $1.00 billion during the same period last year, it said.
September sales were hurt by a shift in the accounting calendar, resulting in a significant portion of pre-Labor Day sales falling in August this year, the retailer said.
Sales for the first eight months of this year were $6.79 billion, up from $6.09 billion during the first eight months of last year.
